title: Divyam Diamond Haaram with Ruby Accents & Pearl Drops
materials: Cultured Pearls. Features Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: Exquisite floral motifs intricately set with brilliant-cut diamonds. Features a central ruby accent and a larger pendant adorned with a teardrop ruby and delicate pearl drops. The necklace employs a prong setting to maximize diamond sparkle, enhanced by a mesh-style gold chain for comfort and durability. Handcrafted with meticulous attention to detail, a testament to our skilled artisans.
colors: a classic and elegant color palette.
occasions: and other special occasions. A stunning choice for the bride's Muhurtham or any festive event where you want to make a statement.
description: This Diamond Haaram is a masterpiece of craftsmanship, blending traditional design with modern elegance. The high-quality diamonds and rubies guarantee brilliance and lasting value. Its timeless beauty makes it a cherished heirloom, symbolizing prosperity and good fortune. A true investment piece with significant cultural value.
